name: Angry Enemy
description:
Let's play amazing Game.

Challenge your skills by adjusting the traction, drag the skull to shoot all enemy of each level. Explore your skill with this adventure game.

Features:
======
- Simple Control, use only one finger to play.
- Addictive Gameplay.
- There are so many easy and hard levels.
- Attractive graphics design.
- Supported all device.

So are you ready for play? Download Now...
